## \_getRelationProps() function

Get state properties of relationships specified in input config.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getRelationProps<TState>(cfg: RelationInclude<TState>): {
    children: ImmutableArray<Prop<TState>>;
    foreigns: ImmutableArray<Prop<TState>>;
};
```
